verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered אִיּ֗וֹב <S%H347><s%> And Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

אָ֭מְנָם <S%H551><s%> No doubt כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> then אַתֶּם־ <S%H859><s%> you עָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> but ye [are] the people וְ֝עִמָּכֶ֗ם <S%H5973><s%> with תָּמ֥וּת <S%H4191><s%> shall die חָכְמָֽה׃ <S%H2451><s%> and wisdom

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> But לִ֤י לֵבָ֨ב ׀ <S%H3824><s%> I have understanding כְּֽמוֹכֶ֗ם <S%H3644><s%> to you yea who knoweth not such things לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> I am not נֹפֵ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> as well as you I [am] not inferior אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I מִכֶּ֑ם <S%H4480><s%> does not וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> know מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> and who אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> such אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> another

שְׂחֹ֤ק <S%H7814><s%> I am [as] one mocked לְרֵעֵ֨הוּ ׀ <S%H7453><s%> of his neighbour אֶֽהְיֶ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> I am קֹרֵ֣א <S%H7121><s%> who calleth לֶ֭אֱלוֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> upon God וַֽיַּעֲנֵ֑הוּ <S%H6030><s%> and he answereth שְׂ֝ח֗וֹק <S%H7814><s%> [man is] laughed to scorn צַדִּ֥יק <S%H6662><s%> him the just תָּמִֽים׃ <S%H8549><s%> upright

לַפִּ֣יד <S%H3940><s%> [is as] a lamp בּ֭וּז <S%H937><s%> despised לְעַשְׁתּ֣וּת <S%H6248><s%> in the thought שַׁאֲנָ֑ן <S%H7600><s%> of him that is at ease נָ֝כ֗וֹן <S%H3559><s%> He that is ready לְמ֣וֹעֲדֵי <S%H4571><s%> to slip רָֽגֶל׃ <S%H7272><s%> with [his] feet

יִשְׁלָ֤יוּ <S%H7951><s%> prosper אֹֽהָלִ֨ים ׀ <S%H168><s%> The tabernacles לְשֹׁ֥דְדִ֗ים <S%H7703><s%> of robbers וּֽ֭בַטֻּחוֹת <S%H987><s%> are secure לְמַרְגִּ֣יזֵי <S%H7264><s%> and they that provoke אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> God לַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Whom הֵבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> bringeth אֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> God בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> into whose hand

וְֽאוּלָ֗ם <S%H199><s%> But שְׁאַל־ <S%H7592><s%> ask נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now בְהֵמ֣וֹת <S%H929><s%> now the beasts וְתֹרֶ֑ךָּ <S%H3384><s%> and they shall teach וְע֥וֹף <S%H5775><s%> thee and the fowls הַ֝שָּׁמַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the air וְיַגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> and they shall tell לָֽךְ׃

א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> Or שִׂ֣יחַ <S%H7878><s%> Or speak לָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the earth וְתֹרֶ֑ךָּ <S%H3384><s%> and it shall teach וִֽיסַפְּר֥וּ <S%H5608><s%> shall declare לְ֝ךָ֗ דְּגֵ֣י <S%H1709><s%> thee and the fishes הַיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> of the sea

מִ֭י <S%H4310><s%> Who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יָדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> Who knoweth בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> That יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> not in all these that the hand יְ֝הוָה <S%H3069><s%> God עָ֣שְׂתָה <S%H6213><s%> hath wrought זֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> In

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whose בְּ֭יָדוֹ <S%H3027><s%> In whose hand נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> [is] the soul כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every חָ֑י <S%H2416><s%> of every living thing וְ֝ר֗וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> and the breath כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בְּשַׂר־ <S%H1320><s%> body אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> he

הֲלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not אֹ֭זֶן <S%H241><s%> Doth not the ear מִלִּ֣ין <S%H4405><s%> words תִּבְחָ֑ן <S%H974><s%> try וְ֝חֵ֗ךְ <S%H2441><s%> as the palate אֹ֣כֶל <S%H400><s%> eating יִטְעַם־ <S%H2938><s%> taste לֽוֹ׃
בִּֽישִׁישִׁ֥ים <S%H3453><s%> With the ancient חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> [is] wisdom וְאֹ֖רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> and in length יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> of days תְּבוּנָֽה׃ <S%H8394><s%> understanding
עִ֭מּוֹ <S%H5973><s%> with חָכְמָ֣ה <S%H2451><s%> With him [is] wisdom וּגְבוּרָ֑ה <S%H1369><s%> and strength ל֝֗וֹ עֵצָ֥ה <S%H6098><s%> he hath counsel וּתְבוּנָֽה׃ <S%H8394><s%> and understanding

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold יַ֭הֲרוֹס <S%H2040><s%> Behold he breaketh down וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יִבָּנֶ֑ה <S%H1129><s%> and it cannot be built again יִסְגֹּ֥ר <S%H5462><s%> he shutteth up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אִ֝֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> can be no יִפָּתֵֽחַ׃ <S%H6605><s%> and there can be no opening

הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold יַעְצֹ֣ר <S%H6113><s%> Behold he withholdeth בַּמַּ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters וְיִבָ֑שׁוּ <S%H3001><s%> and they dry up וִֽ֝ישַׁלְּחֵ֗ם <S%H7971><s%> also he sendeth them out וְיַ֖הַפְכוּ <S%H2015><s%> and they overturn אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth
עִ֭מּוֹ <S%H5973><s%> with עֹ֣ז <S%H5797><s%> With him [is] strength וְתֽוּשִׁיָּ֑ה <S%H8454><s%> and wisdom ל֝֗וֹ שֹׁגֵ֥ג <S%H7683><s%> the deceived וּמַשְׁגֶּֽה׃ <S%H7686><s%> and the deceiver
מוֹלִ֣יךְ <S%H1980><s%> walk יוֹעֲצִ֣ים <S%H3289><s%> counsellors שׁוֹלָ֑ל <S%H7758><s%> away spoiled וְֽשֹׁפְטִ֥ים <S%H8199><s%> and maketh the judges יְהוֹלֵֽל׃ <S%H1984><s%> fools

מוּסַ֣ר <S%H4148><s%> the bond מְלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> of kings פִּתֵּ֑חַ <S%H6605><s%> He looseth וַיֶּאְסֹ֥ר <S%H631><s%> and girdeth אֵ֝ז֗וֹר <S%H232><s%> with a girdle בְּמָתְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4975><s%> their loins
מוֹלִ֣יךְ <S%H1980><s%> walk כֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> princes שׁוֹלָ֑ל <S%H7758><s%> away spoiled וְאֵֽתָנִ֣ים <S%H386><s%> the mighty יְסַלֵּֽף׃ <S%H5557><s%> and overthroweth

מֵסִ֣יר <S%H5493><s%> He removeth away שָׂ֭פָה <S%H8193><s%> the speech לְנֶאֱמָנִ֑ים <S%H539><s%> of the trusty וְטַ֖עַם <S%H2940><s%> the understanding זְקֵנִ֣ים <S%H2205><s%> of the aged יִקָּֽח׃ <S%H3947><s%> and taketh away

שׁוֹפֵ֣ךְ <S%H8210><s%> He poureth בּ֭וּז <S%H937><s%> contempt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on נְדִיבִ֑ים <S%H5081><s%> upon princes וּמְזִ֖יחַ <S%H4206><s%> the strength אֲפִיקִ֣ים <S%H650><s%> of the mighty רִפָּֽה׃ <S%H7503><s%> and weakeneth

מְגַלֶּ֣ה <S%H1540><s%> He discovereth עֲ֭מֻקוֹת <S%H6013><s%> deep things מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> from חֹ֑שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> out of darkness וַיֹּצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> and bringeth out לָא֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> to light צַלְמָֽוֶת׃ <S%H6757><s%> the shadow of death

מַשְׂגִּ֣יא <S%H7679><s%> He increaseth לַ֭גּוֹיִם <S%H1471><s%> the nations וַֽיְאַבְּדֵ֑ם <S%H6><s%> and destroyeth שֹׁטֵ֥חַ <S%H7849><s%> them he enlargeth לַ֝גּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> the nations וַיַּנְחֵֽם׃ <S%H5148><s%> and straiteneth

מֵסִ֗יר <S%H5493><s%> He taketh away לֵ֭ב <S%H3820><s%> the heart רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> of the chief עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> of the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וַ֝יַּתְעֵ֗ם <S%H8582><s%> and causeth them to wander בְּתֹ֣הוּ <S%H8414><s%> in a wilderness לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no דָֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> [where there is] no way

יְמַֽשְׁשׁוּ־ <S%H4959><s%> They grope חֹ֥שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> in the dark וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no א֑וֹר <S%H216><s%> without light וַ֝יַּתְעֵ֗ם <S%H8582><s%> and he maketh them to stagger כַּשִּׁכּֽוֹר׃ <S%H7910><s%> like [a] drunken
